Definition.WordDefinition: Bowler, WI (village, FIPS 9025) Location: 44.86349 N, 88.98200 W Population (1990): 279 (114 housing units) Area: 2.6 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 54416

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bowler \Bowl"er\, n. One who plays at bowls, or who rolls the ball in cricket or any other game. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bowler \Bowl"er\, n. [From 2d {Bowl}.] A derby hat. [Eng.] [Webster 1913 Suppl.]

bowler n 1: delivers the ball to the batsman in cricket 2: rolls balls down an alley at pins 3: a hat that is round and black and hard with a narrow brim; worn by some British businessmen [syn: {bowler hat}, {derby}, {plug hat}]
